strings: As you progress in the game, new lines of programming wisdom will show here
Joris is a great guy but not the best at coding
HTML is not a programming language
The best way to learn programming is to do it
HTML is a markup language ; it places elements like images or text on a page
CSS is a styling language ; it makes the elements on a page look good
JavaScript is a programming language ; it makes the page interactive
This snake game is made with JavaScript, styled with CSS and placed on the page with HTML
The first programming language was created in 1957 by John Backus
The first programming language was called Fortran
The first programming language was created for IBM
The first programmer was Ada Lovelace, she wrote the first algorithm. She was the daughter of the British poet Lord Byron
The first computer weighed 27 tons and was 2.4 meters high
The first computer was called ENIAC
You are now working with a computer that is 1000 times smaller and 1000 times faster than the first computer thanks to the principle of Moore's Law
Moore's Law states that the number of transistors on a microchip doubles every two years
